DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate subjects' treatment satisfaction and to evaluate subjects' preference of pen device and the incidence of clinical technical complains while using NovoPen® 4 under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of NovoPen® 4 on Treatment Satisfaction of Insulin Therapy in Type 1 or Type 2 Subjects With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Any subject with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes and accepting to use NovoPen® 4. The selection will be at the discretion of the individual physician. A study specific signed informed consent must be signed by each subject before any studyrelated activities or information is collected, if required by local regulations Subjects who are unlikely to comply with the protocol, e.g., unwillingness to cooperate, inability to return for the final visit Subjects with known or suspected allergy to any insulin or any of its excipients
